body.p:
Edmonton Ky Feb 27th/64
Hon Thomas E Bramlett
Govenor of Kentucky

Sir -- This is to inform you that John Neal a citizen of Metcalfe county & discharged soldier was Shot & killed on the Streets of the Town of Center in this County by Richard Williams ^Feb 5th 1865^ also a citizen of this county (Metcalfe) -- The act was done so far as I can learn without Provocation and the criminal has made good his escape -- This is therefore to ask that you offer a reasonable reward for his apprehension --

Respectfuly yours --
John Y Wallace
Judge of Metcalfe County Court

$250. Reward for Richd Williams for Murder of John Neal
6th Mch/65
